channel.title: Downloads on OrionUO: Ultima Online

item.title: Download
item.description: RELEASE NOTES 201?-??-?? - Beta release for multiplatform support OLD CLIENT RELEASE NOTES 2018-09-06 OrionUO Client v1.10.0.1 - Bugfix: Fix character selection screen with empty slots - Bugfix: Fix character creation issue with POL server for client protocol 7.013.0 - Bugfix: Fix OrionAssistant so it receives lists for skills and spells - Bugfix: Cleanup WispDataStreams - Change: uo_debug.cfg has been renamed onion.cfg Please update your file. 2018-09-04 OrionUO Client v1.
